\begin{document}


\title{Protection provided by covid-19 vaccines and previous infection against the Omicron variant}

\author{Supplementary Material 2 -- Results of Statistical Estimation}

\date{February 26, 2022
\footnote{Minor corrections on July 24,22: (i) Wrong numbers of events in tables 7--10 corrected,
(ii) rare categories grouped in Secs 16--19 to avoid the R's misleading reporting of zero event categories, (iii) typos and reformulations in the preamble corrected and an explanatory footnote added.
}}

\maketitle

This material contains results of the analyses by Cox Regression (1--14) and Logistic Regression (15--19). The output information of
the former include a forest plot of hazard ratios (the VE's and the protections can be computed by subtraction from one) and tables with the numbers
of individuals\footnote{Only the individuals from the IHIS database are recorded here.} entering the study with the individual immunity statuses and the outcome numbers among people with the corresponding immunity statuses. The results of logistic regressions include forest plots of individual covariates and, in particular, the odds ratios between
variants.

\newpage

\coxresult{IOmicronDetail}{Infections by Vaccines - Omicron}

\end{document}


\coxresult{IOmicronInteractions}{Infections -- Omicron}

\coxresult{IDeltaInteractions}{Infections -- Delta}

\coxresultinf{ROmicron}{Protection by Infection -- Omicron}

\coxresultinf{RDelta}{Protection by Infection -- Delta}


\coxresult{HOmicronInteractions}{Hospitalizations -- Omicron}

\coxresult{HDeltaInteractions}{Hospitalizations -- Delta}

\coxresult{OOmicronInteractions}{Oxygen therapy -- Omicron}

\coxresult{ODeltaInteractions}{Oxygen therapy -- Delta}

\coxresult{UOmicronInteractions}{ICU therapy -- Omicron}

\coxresult{UDeltaInteractions}{ICU therapy -- Delta}

\coxresult{IOmicronDetail}{Infections by Vaccines - Omicron}

\coxresult{IDeltaDetail}{Infections by Vaccines - Delta}

\coxresult{HOmicronDetail}{Hospitalizations by Vaccines - Omicron}

\coxresult{HDeltaDetail}{Hospitalizations by Vaccines - Delta}

\logregresult{logreg_HInteractions}{Hospitalizaton given Infection}

\logregresult{logreg_OInteractions}{Oxygen given Infection}

\logregresult{logreg_IPInteractions}{ICU given Infection}

\logregresult{logreg_HospOInteractions}{Oxagen given Hospitalization}

\logregresult{logreg_HospIPInteractions}{ICU given Hospitalization}

\coxresult{IOmicronInteractionsSensitivity}{Infections -- Omicron -- Sensitivity}


\end{document}
